short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds preview and copy theme ID buttons to Shopify theme editor.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension adds "Preview" and "Copy Theme ID" buttons directly in the Shopify theme editor, making your workflow faster and more efficient.
